title: State of the Steelers: What organization's past tells us about Mike Tomlin's future
content: With a contract option decision due by March 1, 2026, the team and the 53-year-old coach stay "businesslike."

title: Why Dolphins coach Mike McDaniel is so much more than a meme
content: McDaniel has grown famous for his viral moments, but people who have played for him say he's so much more.

title: Mahomes avoided major damage to rest of knee
content: An MRI revealed, that besides his torn ACL, Patrick Mahomes didn't have any major damage to his other ligaments in his left knee.

title: MRI confirms Parsons has torn ACL, source says
content: An MRI confirmed that Packers star pass rusher Micah Parsons suffered a season-ending torn ACL, a source told ESPN.

title: Commanders shut down Daniels for rest of year
content: Jayden Daniels' injury-marred second season is over. The Commanders have shut down the quarterback a week after he aggravated his dislocated left, non-throwing elbow.

title: Spurs mull bringing Wemby off bench in Cup final
content: The Spurs are discussing different ways to deploy Victor Wembanyama vs. the Knicks in the NBA Cup final, including having him come off the bench.

title: Rivers to remain Colts' QB1 for MNF vs. 49ers
content: Philip Rivers will remain the Colts' starting quarterback for their Week 16 "Monday Night Football" matchup with the 49ers, coach Shane Steichen said Monday.

title: Burrow to start final 3 games: 'We want to win'
content: Quarterback Joe Burrow is expected to start the final three games of the regular season, coach Zac Taylor said Monday.

title: Bob Stoops closes chapter on coaching career
content: Bob Stoops, who won a national championship at Oklahoma and had served as coach of the UFL's Dallas Renegades for four seasons, has announced his retirement.

title: Ex-South Carolina star QB Taneyhill dies at 52
content: Steve Taneyhill, a record-setting quarterback for the South Carolina Gamecocks best known for his distinctive long-flowing mullet and his home run swing after touchdown passes, has died. He was 52.

title: üòà Soup season: Bills cook Patriots in NFL trolls
content: NFL teams remained petty in Week 15 with the Buffalo Bills poking fun at the New England Patriots after a huge road win.

content: Micah Parsons and Patrick Mahomes both suffered significant knee injuries Sunday. What do they mean for the Packers' playoff push and the Chiefs' offseason plans?

content: Madrid's manager may have bought himself time, while a lack of replacements could help him keep his the job.

content: Which lines offered value once odds came out? Here are games we are eyeing for bets going into Week 16.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Milan eye January move for Arsenal's Jesus
content: Will AC Milan be able to sign Gabriel Jesus in January? Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Tariffs shrugged off: Exports beat Trump curbs, record fastest growth in 3+ years
content: India's exports surged 19.4% in November, reaching $38.1 billion, the fastest growth in over three years, driven by strong shipments to the US and China. This robust performance, coupled with a 2% dip in imports, narrowed the trade deficit to its lowest since June. Key sectors like engineering goods and electronics led the export boom, indicating market diversification.

title: Ukraine war talks: US agrees to offer security guarantees to Kyiv ‚Äì report
content: The United States has agreed to offer security guarantees to Ukraine following talks with President Zelenskyy in Berlin. Discussions narrowed differences on security assurances and Russia's territorial demands, with a US-drafted peace plan reportedly 90% agreed. Further negotiations are anticipated, with a ceasefire requiring strong legal and material backing.

title: IPL auction: Five uncapped Indians who could draw big bids
content: The IPL auction in Abu Dhabi features 350 cricketers, including 240 Indians, vying for 77 slots. Top international stars like Cameron Green and David Miller have set a base price of Rs 2 crore. With limited budgets, uncapped Indian players such as Prashant Veer and Ravi Singh are expected to attract significant interest from franchises.

title: 25 years of 'cloud': Salesforce CEO says it's over: Company may rename itself
content: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff has ditched the word "cloud," a significant shift for the tech pioneer. Focus groups revealed customers now prioritize discussing AI agents over cloud technology. This pivot is underscored by renaming products to "Agentforce" and a massive bet on AI, evidenced by layoffs and substantial deal closures, aiming for $60 billion in revenue by 2030.

title: Watch: Delhi CM Rekha Gupta greeted with 'AQI' chants at Messi event
content: Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta was met with chants of 'AQI, AQI' as she welcomed Lionel Messi, with the city's Air Quality Index reaching severe levels. The Aam Aadmi Party criticized the BJP governments for inaction as toxic air affected the region, with the prime minister remaining silent on the issue.

title: Starlink VP Nicolls seems 'unhappy' with China‚Äôs satellite launch; says: Most of the risk ...
content: SpaceX has voiced concerns over China's recent satellite launches, citing a dangerous 200-meter close approach between a Starlink satellite and a newly deployed Chinese craft. Michael Nicolls of SpaceX highlighted a critical lack of coordination and data sharing among satellite operators as the primary risk in space. This incident underscores the growing need for better communication in orbital operations.

title: Sri Lanka to arrest 1996 World Cup-winning captain Arjuna Ranatunga
content: Sri Lankan authorities are planning to arrest former cricket captain Arjuna Ranatunga on corruption charges related to his time as petroleum minister. He and his brother are accused of altering oil procurement procedures, causing an estimated $5 million loss to the state. His brother has been arrested and released on bail, with a travel ban imposed.

title: ‚ÄòThey want to kill Americans‚Äô: Trump to label fentanyl 'weapon of mass destruction'
content: President Trump announced plans to classify fentanyl as a "weapon of mass destruction" to combat drug smuggling. He stated that adversaries traffic fentanyl to harm Americans, drawing historical parallels to drug-related societal collapse. This move could lead to stricter penalties for traffickers, though the drug has legitimate medical uses.

title: Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‚Äòbanned‚Äô chips behind Jan market rout
content: Nvidia has denied reports that Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is using smuggled Blackwell GPUs, calling the claims "far-fetched." The US has banned these advanced chips from export to China to maintain its AI lead. DeepSeek's previous AI model launch at a lower cost had already rattled US markets and sparked concerns about China's AI progress.

title: Blake Lively calls Taylor Swift 'the dreamiest friend' amid Eras Tour buzz
content: Blake Lively celebrated a business venture amid reports of a strained friendship with Taylor Swift. Swift is reportedly "hurt" and feels used due to Lively's legal issues involving her "It Ends with Us" co-star. Lively's social media post focused on her haircare brand collaboration, pointedly avoiding any mention of Swift, highlighting a careful navigation of public perception and personal relationships.

title: Bukayo Saka & Tolami Benson net worth 2025: Earnings, brands, lifestyle
content: Arsenal star Bukayo Saka is a financial powerhouse, with his net worth projected around $30 million by 2025, fueled by his lucrative club contract and major endorsement deals. His partner, Tolami Benson, also boasts an independent career in public relations and investments, contributing to their combined financial standing. Saka's marketability continues to soar.

title: Where does Auston Matthews live? Inside Leafs star‚Äôs homes and lifestyle
content: Auston Matthews' net worth is estimated at $30 million in 2025, driven by his substantial NHL salary and lucrative endorsement deals with major brands like Nike and RBC. Beyond hockey, he has strategically invested in startups and actively supports men's health through philanthropy, showcasing a multi-faceted financial profile.

title: Connor McDavid reacts after Oilers trade Stuart Skinner and Brett Kulak
content: The Edmonton Oilers made a significant roster change, trading goalie Stuart Skinner and defenseman Brett Kulak to the Pittsburgh Penguins for Tristan Jarry and Spencer Stastney. While the move addressed goaltending needs, it was acknowledged as a difficult decision by players like Connor McDavid and Head Coach Kris Knoblauch, who praised the departing players' contributions.

title: Jordan visit: PM Modi meets King Abdullah II in Amman; leaders discuss Gaza, counter-terrorism
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met with Jordan's King Abdullah II in Amman, marking a significant bilateral visit to strengthen ties and discuss regional stability, particularly concerning Gaza. The leaders celebrated 75 years of diplomatic relations and explored enhanced cooperation across various sectors, including counter-terrorism efforts and economic partnerships.

title: Serena vs Venus Williams Net Worth 2025: Tennis sisters‚Äô wealth compared
content: In 2025, tennis legends Serena and Venus Williams boast significant wealth from their careers and business ventures. Serena, with a net worth of $340-350 million, excels in investments and various projects, while Venus, estimated at $90-95 million, thrives with her fashion and design brands. Both continue to influence the sport and remain active.

title: 5 common household items that carry cancer risk
content: Everyday products may influence cancer risk, with concerns growing about chemicals in some daily household items which you don't even know about . While some substances are classified as possibly carcinogenic, experts stress that not all associations prove risk.  Research highlights potential links, but definitive causal evidence for typical household use is often limited.

title: Davante Adams injury update: Insider reveals devastating news before Seahawks game
content: Davante Adams suffered a significant hamstring injury during the Los Angeles Rams' Week 15 game against the Detroit Lions. NFL insider Ian Rapoport expressed concern about his availability for Thursday's matchup against the Seattle Seahawks, suggesting a potential return for the playoffs is the best-case scenario. The team and Adams have not yet confirmed any return timeline.

title: BMC polls: Mahayuti eyes Mumbai but Pune flashpoint; Thackeray reunion shakes MVA
content: Maharashtra's long-pending civic body elections are finally scheduled for January 15, with results on January 16. The Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) polls are seen as a key political mood test, pitting the ruling Mahayuti alliance against a fractured opposition. Control of the BMC, Asia's wealthiest civic corporation, holds immense political and economic significance.

title: Quote of the day by Charles Dickens: 'The most important thing in life is to stop saying‚Ä¶'
content: Charles Dickens, a renowned author, left a legacy of impactful stories and social reform. His quote inspires action over mere wishes. It encourages embracing possibilities as probabilities. This wisdom guides generations to pursue goals with determination. Dickens' message promotes personal and communal growth through will and perseverance.

title: Why isn‚Äôt Seth Curry playing tonight? Warriors guard seeks steady role
content: Seth Curry, brother of NBA star Stephen Curry, has joined the Golden State Warriors, fulfilling a long-held aspiration. Despite a strong debut performance, his playing time has been limited, with coach Steve Kerr citing rotation adjustments.  His sister-in-law, Ayesha Curry, expressed immense pride and support for his emotional return to the Bay Area.

title: Pak-origin gunmen at Bondi: Intifada goes global - the West looks away
content: A Hanukkah celebration at Sydney's Bondi Beach was shattered by a massacre on December 14, 2025. A father and son, linked to extremist networks, opened fire, killing 16 and wounding dozens in a targeted antisemitic attack. This tragedy, Australia's deadliest mass shooting since 1996, highlights the global weaponization of anti-Israel slogans into violence and exposes the fragility of multicultural harmony.

title: J&K encounter under way: Cop killed, terrorists trapped; heavy firing reported
content: Security forces have established contact with terrorists in the Majalta area of Udhampur district, Jammu and Kashmir. The encounter began after a cordon-and-search operation, with intermittent firing reported. Reinforcements have been deployed, and escape routes are blocked.

title: New Year's Eve terror plot: FBI foils major attack; 5 held for planning bombings
content: US federal authorities have arrested four individuals accused of plotting coordinated New Year's Eve bomb attacks across Southern California. The suspects, allegedly linked to the Turtle Island Liberation Front, were preparing to test improvised explosive devices in the desert. A fifth arrest was made in New Orleans in connection with a separate planned attack.

title: Ayesha Curry admits she never expected to fall for NBA star Stephen Curry
content: Stephen and Ayesha Curry's love story began in childhood at church, though they didn't start dating until their teenage years. Ayesha's unwavering support, even encouraging Stephen to finish his degree before the NBA draft, solidified his decision to marry her. Their enduring marriage has weathered public scrutiny, with Stephen consistently crediting his wife.

title: Homegrown hellfire: Used in Op Sindoor to crush Pak; why 'Hammer' deal matters
content: India's decision to manufacture the French HAMMER precision-guided weapon marks a strategic shift towards mastering modern air warfare technologies. This move from importing finished munitions to domestic production signifies a focus on accuracy, stand-off reach, and controlled escalation in future conflicts.

title: Where is Aung San Suu Kyi? Son fears for her life amid detention
content: Aung San Suu Kyi's son fears he may not know of his mother's death due to her failing health and lack of contact since Myanmar's 2021 coup.  Detained for years, she faces health issues and isolation. Her son urges global pressure on the junta, hoping upcoming elections might offer a chance for her release or house arrest, despite their illegitimacy.

title: Stolen childhoods: How fallout between two generals destroyed Sudan - explained
content: Sudan‚Äôs war erupted in April 2023 after a power struggle between rival generals Abdel Fattah al-Burhan and Mohamed Hamdan Dagalo collapsed into nationwide fighting. What began as elite infighting has become the world‚Äôs largest displacement crisis, devastating cities, services and livelihoods. Ethnic violence has returned to Darfur, while millions face famine, disease and forgotten suffering amid weak international response.

title: Jaylen Warren injury update: Will Steelers RB play vs Dolphins today?
content: Pittsburgh Steelers' running back Jaylen Warren is questionable for Monday Night Football against the Miami Dolphins due to illness. Despite waking up sick, Warren is receiving fluids and remains optimistic about playing. His availability, even at reduced capacity, could be crucial for the Steelers' playoff push, with Kenneth Gainwell ready to step up if needed.

title: Rob Reiner killed: Trump posts shocking rant; 'he drove people crazy'
content: Hollywood director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele Singer Reiner were found dead at their home. President Trump, in a social media post, linked their deaths to Reiner's criticism of him, attributing it to "TRUMP DERANGEMENT SYNDROME." Their son has been arrested, but authorities have not confirmed a motive or any family involvement.

title: 'You are like Yuvraj Singh': Sooryavanshi compared to former India batter
content: Teenage sensation Vaibhav Sooryavanshi is gaining popularity, with young fans comparing him to Yuvraj Singh. Sooryavanshi is currently part of India‚Äôs Under-19 squad at the ACC Men‚Äôs Under-19 Asia Cup 2025. In the opening match of the tournament, he scored 171 runs against UAE and played a key role in India‚Äôs win.

title: Delhi airport chaos: 228 flights cancelled amid dense fog; airlines issue advisory
content: Dense fog crippled Delhi's airport on Monday, leading to 228 flight cancellations and five diversions.  Visibility plummeted, impacting operations under CAT III conditions.  Authorities urged passengers to check flight status, prioritizing safety amidst the severe air quality and persistent smog.  Airlines also issued advisories, warning of schedule disruptions.

title: ‚ÄòNo dead economy gets upgrades‚Äô: FM cites 8.2% growth to rebut Trump
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman refuted claims of India being a "dead economy" in the Lok Sabha, citing strong growth figures and sovereign rating upgrades. She highlighted India's position as the fastest-growing major economy, with 8.2% growth in the September quarter, and emphasized the country's transition from fragility to fortitude.

title: Is Christian Watson playing Week 16 vs Bears? Latest Packers injury update
content: Christian Watson sustained a chest injury during the Packers' loss to the Broncos on December 15th after a hard fall on an interception. He was taken to a local hospital for further evaluation, raising concerns given his recent return from a torn ACL. Watson had been a key offensive weapon for Green Bay prior to this latest setback.

title: Singapore High Commission‚Äôs advisory on air pollution triggers war of words
content: The advisory posted by Singapore High Commissioner Simon Wong on X urged Singapore nationals in the Delhi National Capital Region to pay heed to restrictions imposed under Stage IV of the Graded Response Action Plan in Delhi

content: The Defence Ministry said the celebrations highlighted the Indian Army‚Äôs steady transformation into a modern, innovative and self-reliant force

title: Minimum temperature in Telangana likely to dip by 3-4¬∞C over next two days
content: According to data from Telangana Development Planning Society, between December 14 and 15, seven districts in the State recorded minimum temperatures of 10¬∞C or below with Sirpur in Kumaram Bheem Asifabad district recording the lowest minimum temperature of 7.6¬∞C.

title: Association seeks GI tag for Thoothukudi pearls
content: It highlights the cultural and symbolic significance of Thoothukudi pearls in Tamil tradition, where they were associated with purity, divinity and royal power. The pearls were traditionally used in temple offerings, royal ornaments and diplomatic gifts

title: Supreme Court extends interim protection from arrest granted to actors in chit fund case

title: Bengaluru‚Äôs wastewater management may get Swiss tech boost
content: Bengaluru‚Äôs wastewater management systems may soon receive a global upgrade, with Swiss start-ups expressing interest in piloting advanced treatment technologies at the city‚Äôs sewage treatment plants

title: PM mourns death of Assam editor P.G. Baruah
content: Prafulla Gobinda Baruah, also the managing director of The Assam Tribune group, breathed his last on December 14 night

title: Potti Sriramulu‚Äôs house in Chennai will be developed as a memorial, says A.P. CM
content: Smruthi Vanam is being built in Amaravati where a statue of Sriramulu will be installed and named as the ‚ÄòStatue of Sacrifice‚Äô, says Naidu

title: Watch: CM Nitish Kumar pulls down woman's hijab at event; Cong, RJD slam 'vile act'
content: Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar removed the hijab of a woman AYUSH doctor during an appointment letter distribution event in Patna. The incident, captured on video, has sparked political criticism, with the Rashtriya Janata Dal accusing the CM of a "Sanghi" mindset. The doctor appeared visibly upset after the headscarf was removed.

title: 'A dream and a duty': 'Fan' Sunil Chhetri reflects on meeting Messi
content: Indian football icon Sunil Chhetri experienced a fanboy moment meeting Lionel Messi in Mumbai, receiving a signed Argentina jersey. Chhetri expressed his joy and gratitude for the encounter, calling Messi's art an antidote to sadness. The Argentine star's tour also included a stop in Delhi, featuring exchanges with cricket officials.

title: Armed with objections against ward delimitation, legislators make a beeline to GHMC
content: Leaders from Congress, BRS, BJP raise concerns over voter imbalance, unclear criteria and lack of consultation with sitting legislators; over 1,300 suggestions received so far; December 17 set as deadline for submission of objections

content: The train will halt at Bhimavaram Town, Gudivada, Vijayawada, Tenali, Ongole, Nellore and Renigunta before reaching MGR Chennai Central station

content: Veteran Congress leader and Davanagere South MLA Shamanur Shivashankarappa passed away on December 14, 2025, at the age of 94 due to age-related complications

content: A total of 34 MLAs, including some belonging to the Kuki community, took part in the meeting on Sunday

title: SHANTI Bill spurs private sector to make, run nuclear plants
content: The SHANTI Bill penalises operators in case of a nuclear accident, requiring them to compensate on the basis of the the size of plants operated and not the damage experienced in itself

title: Watch: Lionel Messi ends G.O.A.T. India Tour with grand Delhi finale
content: Lionel Messi brought his much-anticipated G.O.A.T. India Tour to a spectacular close in Delhi, thrilling thousands of fans after a chaotic start in Kolkata on December 13.

content: Citing precedence, Law Minister says EC‚Äôs revision took place earlier¬†too under various governments; Opposition continues criticism over exercise

content: Petitioners have sought the court‚Äôs intervention in transferring the probe from the West Bengal Police to Central investigating agencies

content: While the LDF has much to ponder over the drubbing in some of its traditional strongholds, the UDF is elated about the more-than-anticipated victory of its candidates across the district

title: Unemployment rate falls to 4.7% in November, lowest since April: Government survey
content: The PLFS stated that the overall Labour Force Participation Rate increased to 55.8% in November, the highest level recorded since April.

title: In Kerala, Modi government favouring Adani group in highway road projects: Venugopal
content: Claiming a ‚Äúhighway scam‚Äù, the Congress MP says that from Kasaragod in the north to Kollam in the south, National Highway projects, two major stretches NH 66 and NH 544, are collapsing before the eyes of the public

content: Joseph says that the move not only disrespects Gandhi‚Äôs contributions but also risks destabilising a vital employment guarantee programme that has been crucial for rural livelihoods since its inception in 2005.

title: Beypore gears up for water fest
content: Contestants from five countries are expected to take part in the kite festival, one of the major attractions of water fest; cycle rally from Kozhikode to Beypore on December 25 to herald the start of the festival

title: Nadda appoints Sanjay Saraogi as new Bihar BJP president
content: The 56-year-old leader is five times MLA hails from the Vaishya community, which is the core voter of the party. He earlier served as the coordinator of the Bihar State BJP Cow Protection Cell.

title: Attracting younger audiences to classical music concerts is a challenge, says A.R. Rahman

content: The State government has appointed senior advocate Prof. Ravi Verma Kumar to represent the State in a writ petition before the High Court

content: The initiative will enable devotees to make offerings and payments in a hassle-free manner, in line with modern digital practices, says EO

content: As per climate experts, Munnar is witnessing an early winter after 2018. Usually extreme cold is experienced in the hill station from the first week of January

title: EU Imposes Sanctions On Oil Traders With Links To Russia's Shipping Network
content: The European Union adopted fresh sanctions against Russian oil interests on Monday, targeting traders Murtaza Lakhani and Etibar Eyyub for helping Moscow to circumvent Western sanctions on crude exports that help to fund Russia's war in Ukraine.

title: "Very Good Talks With Zelensky", Ukraine Deal "Closer Than Ever": Trump
content: US President Donald Trump said Monday that a deal to end Russia's war in Ukraine was closer than ever, after he spoke to Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky and a host of European leaders.

title: UK Defence Chief Says "Whole Nation" Must Ready To Fight Amid Russia Threat
content: The new head of Britain's armed forces warned on Monday that "more" Britons will need to be ready to fight for their country due to an increasingly dangerous world.

title: Video: Ukraine Hits Russian Submarine In First Underwater Drone Attack
content: Ukrainian underwater drones struck and disabled a Russian Kilo-class attack submarine in the Russian navy's most important remaining Black Sea base, in the first operation of its kind, Ukrainian officials said on Monday.

title: Rs 85 Lakh Looted From Noida Trader's Accountant In UP
content: Unidentified bike-borne assailants on Monday looted Rs 85 lakh from an accountant of a Noida-based trader after knocking him off his motorcycle on the Delhi-Lucknow highway in Hapur district, police said.

title: Class 11 Boy Allegedly Rapes 14-Year-Old Girl, Shares Video On Social Media
content: Police in Rajasthan's Pali district have booked an 11th-grade student for allegedly raping a student studying in Class 9 and sharing explicit photos and videos of the incident on social media, officials said on Monday.

title: Man Sets Himself Ablaze Near Bombay High Court Over Dispute With Lawyer
content: A man attempted to commit suicide by immolating himself outside the premises of the Bombay High Court here on Monday evening, police said.

title: House Burned Down, Meitei Woman's Struggle For Passport, Cabin Crew Job
content: Members of the Meitei community in a sit-in protest in Delhi's Jantar Mantar alleged the government has not done enough to ensure all internally displaced persons (IDPs) can return home across Manipur, over two years since ethnic violence began.

title: India Proposes Preferential Trade Deal With Mexico To Offset Steep Tariffs
content: India has proposed a preferential trade agreement (PTA) with Mexico to help domestic exporters deal with the steep tariffs announced by the South American country, a top government official said on Monday.

title: Pune Teen Stabbed To Death By Classmate At Coaching Centre In Pune
content: A 16-year-old boy was killed after a classmate allegedly attacked him with a knife inside a classroom at a coaching centre in Pune district on Monday, police said.

title: Delhi Air Pollution: Vets See Surge In Respiratory, Eye Diseases In Animals
content: Pets and birds are increasingly showing signs of respiratory distress, eye infections, and stomach ailments with rising pollution in Delhi, the city's veterinary doctors have said.

title: Poll Body To Publish Bengal Draft Electoral Rolls Today
content: The Election Commission is set to publish the draft electoral rolls for West Bengal on Tuesday, following the completion of the statewide Special Intensive Revision (SIR) ahead of the 2026 assembly polls.

title: Bombay High Court Converts Civil Suit On Goa Nightclub Fire Into PIL
content: The Bombay High Court on Monday converted a civil suit against Birch by Romeo Lane nightclub into a Public Interest Litigation (PIL), saying "someone has to be held accountable" for the tragedy in which 25 people were killed.

title: Nobel Peace Winner Maria Machado Fractured Vetebra While Fleeing Venezuela
content: Venezuelan opposition leader and Nobel Peace Prize laureate Maria Corina Machado suffered a vertebra fracture during her secret journey out of hiding in Venezuela to Norway last week, her spokesperson said Monday.

title: "Dont Roam Without Guardian": UP Cops 'Advice' To Girl Sparks Row
content: A station house officer in eastern Uttar Pradesh has been transferred after she allegedly stopped a girl and her brother at a temple park in Mau district and advised her not to venture out in public places without a "guardian", officials said

title: Bondi Beach Shooting Highlights: Shooter Was On Cops Radar For 6 Years
content: Australia Bondi Beach Shooting Highlights: At least 16 people, including a shooter, were killed, and as many as 42 others were hospitalised after 50-year-old Sajid Akram and his 24-year-old son Naveed Akram opened fire on a crowd in Sydney.

title: "Largest Gift To Mumbaikars": Eknath Shinde Announces 295-Acre Central Park
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde on Monday said a world-class 'Central Park' will be developed over a total area of 295 acres, combining the open land of Mahalaxmi Racecourse and the Coastal Road.

title: Cop Killed In Encounter With Terrorists In J&K, Operation Still On
content: A personnel from the Special Operations Group of the Jammu and Kashmir police has been killed in action during an encounter with terrorists in Udhampur.

title: Nitin Nabin Takes Charge As BJP National Working President
content: The newly-appointed national working president of the BJP, Nitin Nabin, took charge of his new responsibility, with top leaders saying his organisational skills will provide a new direction to the party's journey of public service and nation-building

title: Women Start Night Patrolling To Fight Drug Gangs In Himachal
content: In the dead of winter nights, groups of women step out of their cosy homes in Leghat village of Bilaspur district here, holding torches and wielding sticks, to patrol the silent streets.

content: Raj Shekhar Jha is a journalist for the Times of India with over a decade of experience in reporting on national security, terrorism, crime and prisons.

title: Pollution boards understaffed: Nearly half of posts vacant nationwide; NCAP funds poorly used
content: nearly half of the sanctioned positions on pollution control boards and committees remain vacant . the vacancy was 16.3% in CPCB as of Nov, 43.8% in PCCs and 47.6% in the SPCBs as of Aug.

title: Havoc at IGI: 228 flights cancelled, 800 delayed
content: Priyangi Agarwal writes on environmental and climate change issues, connecting these topics to the everyday lives of people. She tracks developments across the capital‚Äôs transport hubs‚ÄîDelhi Metro, Namo Bharat Trains, and Delhi Airport‚Äîwhile also reporting on pressing social issues. Her stories blend data analysis with voices from the ground to tell human-centred narratives. Previously stationed in western Uttar Pradesh, she focused her coverage on minority issues, health, and human rights. Read More

title: MGNREGA to end: Modi govt unveils new rural jobs law 'G RAM G', guarantees 125 days work
content: 'viksit Bharat Guarantee for Rozgar and Ajeevika Mission (Gramin) (VB-G RAM G) Bill, 2025', will repeal MGNREGA, put in place an implementation paraphernalia that is similar to the job scheme even as it diverges on consequential provisions . also hikes the promised employment for a rural household from 100 days under the scheme to 125 days . the new law will shift the Centre's financial burden to states, provide fixed budget

title: College football bowl season: MVPs for the first two bowl games of the season
content: south Carolina State beat Prairie View A&M 40‚Äì38 with a two-point conversion . it's one of the most exciting times of the year as the 2025 bowl season is underway . college football experts provide their MVP picks for each of the 36 bowl games this season .

title: SIR: Draft rolls for 5 states, UTs due today; deletions pegged at 7.5‚Äì8.5%
content: Bharti Jain is senior editor with The Times of India, New Delhi. She has been writing on security matters since 1996. Having covered the Union home ministry, security agencies, Election Commission and the ‚Äòprime‚Äô political beat, the Congress, for The Economic Times all these years, she moved to TOI in August 2012. Her repertoire of news stories delves into the whole gamut of issues related to terrorism and internal strife, besides probing strategic affairs in India‚Äôs neighbourhood. Read More

title: Latur shocker: Finance firm manager burns man alive to fake own death; planned insurance claim
content: police tracked the accused using technical analysis and a lead linked to a woman with whom he had an affair . the accused was under financial stress, with loans totalling Rs 97 lakh taken to buy flats in Mumbai and Latur . if he was declared dead, the term insurance would clear the liabilities .

title: ‚ÄòRevenge for Moose Wala‚Äô: Kabaddi player shot dead; gunmen open fire during match
content: kabaddi promoter was shot dead in front of hundreds of spectators at a tournament in Mohali . it was revenge for the murder of sidhu Moose Wala . rival gang of Lawrence Bishnoi boasted on social media naming killers as 'Makkhan Amritsar and Defaulter Karne'

title: Ranking all 64 teams in College Football Playoff history
content: the new era of college football features a larger College Football Playoff and a lower bar for inclusion . the transfer portal and increased freedom of movement for players have meant that today's best teams can't stockpile awesome backups as easily as they could in the past .

title: The NHL's best this week: Get set for the next round of the Battle of Florida
content: the next installment of the Battle of Florida will be contested between the Tampa Bay Lightning and Florida Panthers . the two teams entered the league one year apart, including the Bolts in 1992 and the Cats a year later . but the rivalry was purely geographical, with the hockey world largely focusing on other feuds or thriving franchises.

title: Has Lawrence leveled up? Pats-Bills rematch? Let's overreact to Week 15
content: the playoffs will be Chiefs-free for the first time in 11 years . it means the AFC Championship Game will be contested without the Chiefs . the playoff game will be held without the chiefs for a second time in eight years, it's not an overreaction .

title: Free agent pickups: What can you do to replace Patrick Mahomes?
content: the 15th Sunday of the season featured several notable comebacks . a pair of season-ending knee injuries may define this week for both the short and long term . the qbs ranked second among all qBs in week 15 .

title: Best fits for transfer quarterback DJ Lagway: Five schools that make the most sense
content: DJ Lagway is the top-rated quarterback in the 2024 ESPN 300 . he's coming off a 4-8 season in which he threw 14 interceptions and ranked 14th in the conference in QBR (59.5) but there's still a market for his talents if the 19-game starter can find the right situation and stay healthy .

title: NFL Week 15's fashionable arrivals, featuring Cowboys QB Dak Prescott
content: the weather is turning cooler this late in the season, which means players are running out of time to show off their best pregame fits . the weather has turned cooler in some parts of the country at this time, leading to cozier fit . some teams playing in warmer weather made sure to take advantage of the climate in their entrance .

title: Winners and losers: Henderson, Lawrence paint playoff masterpiece
content: t reVeyon Henderson scored 30.1 fantasy points, had a pair of 50-plus yard touchdowns on which he was clocked at faster than 20 mph on each . in Week 10, he scored 28.0 fantasy points and ran for 105 more yards than expected .

title: Big questions from Week 15 games: Can the Rams take the 1-seed? What now for the Chiefs?
content: quarterback Patrick Mahomes left the Chiefs' loss late in the fourth quarter with a knee injury . the quarterbacks denied the Patriots a chance to clinch the AFC East title . texans and Jaguars also scored 40-plus points in dominant victories .

title: MLB offseason grades: Phillies add OF Garcia, D-backs reunite with Kelly
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . the deal: one year, $10 million Grade: D The Philadelphia Phillies have been seeking an upgrade on Nick Castellanos in right field for a couple of years .

title: J&K: Omar joins power project row, says BJP MLAs interfering
content: construction firm megha engineering and infrastructure Ltd. has threatened to pull out over alleged interference by a local BJP legislator . he said two local lawmakers of the BJP are interfering in all power projects in the Kishtwar district .
